ing.item: Cut-up DOLE Fresh Fruit (oranges, grapes, plums, strawberries, and peaches)
Lowfat vanilla, lemon or your favorite yogurt (16oz)

directions.step:
Toss bananas with lemon juice. Layer fresh fruit, yogurt, bananas and walnuts into 4 dishes. Top with additional chopped walnuts and bananas slices.
From Tuscon area newspapers, 1994, 3rd quarter, courtest Mike Orchekowski. File ftp://ftp.idiscover.co.uk/pub/food/mealmaster/recipes/tn-94q3.zip
